DataElement.preferredName: Investigator Study Protocol Contact Person Telecommunication Address ISO21090.DSET.TEL.1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:A person acting as a channel for communication on behalf of a group._The value for a particular telecommunication address used as the contact telecommunication information for a person or organization._A collection containing unordered distinct/discrete values of the type TEL.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Investigator Study Protocol Contact Person Telecommunication Address
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:A person acting as a channel for communication on behalf of a group._The value for a particular telecommunication address used as the contact telecommunication information for a person or organization.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.:A person acting as a channel for communication on behalf of a group.

Concepts.definition: An individual who conducts scientific research. In a clinical setting this individual actually conducts and/or supervises the clinical investigation and study-related procedures.  The investigator monitors the safety of the trial subjects and investigational staff (under whose immediate direction an agent is administered or dispensed to a subject).  The investigator collects and analyses data and study documents, and provides reports in compliance with applicable requirements.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
A rule which guides how an activity should be performed.
A person acting as a channel for communication between groups or on behalf of a group.

Property.preferredDefinition: The value for a particular telecommunication address used as the contact telecommunication information for a person or organization.

Concepts.definition: The value for a particular telecommunication address used as the contact telecommunication information for a person or organization.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A collection containing unordered distinct/discrete values of the type TEL.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
